creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: young man kneeling at a riverbank, grasping a large fish; the man is looking behind him to an angel in the R side of image, who is pointing in an instructive manner and holding a purse; dog at far R, city in background at L
marks:
Signature and Inscription

inscribed in plate al monogram in plate at upper left: [PG]
title: Tobias Catches the Fish
